name: MedAlert
0:
”Alexa, open med alert”
”Alexa, ask med alert for free features”
”help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: med alert
des:
Stay on top of your health with Med Alert, the ultimate medication management app designed to help you never miss a refill. Med Alert ensures you receive timely reminders for when it's time to refill your medicines, so you can focus on feeling your best.

Key Features:

Refill Reminders: Get notified via mobile SMS, push notifications, and your Alexa Echo device when it's time to refill your prescriptions.
Customizable Alerts: Set personalized reminders based on your medication schedule and preferences.
Easy Tracking: Keep track of all your medications in one place with our user-friendly interface.
Voice Integration: Simply ask Alexa to check your medication schedule or set a new reminder.
Secure and Private: Your health information is stored securely and is only accessible to you.
With Med Alert, managing your medications has never been easier. Stay organized, stay healthy, and let Med Alert handle the rest.

Download Med Alert today and experience peace of mind with every dose.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
